Abilities.name: purity
Abilities.description: Damage counters of all effects against this unit are increased by 3.

Abilities.name: spiritual-leader
Abilities.description: Effects applied to this unit are also applied to all team units.

Abilities.name: strong-will
Abilities.description: Attacks by this unit cannot be weaked.

Abilities.name: gratitude
Abilities.description: Whenever this unit is healed, heal 4 damage to the healer.
